scripts.start: concurrently --prefix '[{name}]' --names 'CLIENT,BUILD-SERVER,SERVER' -c 'bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgYellow.bold' 'yarn run start-client' 'yarn run watch-build-server' 'yarn run watch-start-server'
scripts.build: yarn run build-client && yarn run build-server
scripts.watch-build-server: nodemon -L --watch src/common --watch src/server --ext ts --delay 1 --exec 'yarn run build-server || exit 1'
scripts.watch-start-server: nodemon -L --on-change-only --delay 2 --watch build-server/common --watch build-server/server --ext js --exec 'yarn run start-prod || exit 1'
